Reviews.Title: Looks  like an S4
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: The phone works great and definitely feels like a Galaxy S4 with the jelly bean running and specs. Nice Phone for the price

Reviews.Title: Fei Teng H9500 smartphone
Reviews.Author: KM
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for 2 months, I had a slight problem charging the batteries at first but I ended up using a samsung charger and it charged up just fine and been working great ever since.  The appearance is good, the screen and resolution is great HD720 but its not samsungs AMOLED but it is a quad core and its fast and does what its designed to do.  It does have the A-GPS along with a few other things so you have to go and turn off manually to maximize battery use.  I personally do not enable this unless I travel and use this phone as a GPS.  It also comes with 2 batteries.  The cameras work great for quick pics.  It can also support 2 sim cards, one regular and one micro sim and supports up to 32gb micro sd card.  The phone itself has a 5gb storage as well.  The design is of course a little different from the real Galaxy S4 but for the price and my experience so far using this phone has been worth the money without breaking the bank.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Rashad
Reviews.Content: I Love My phone, although i cannot buy any case to fit my phone it work fine,I wouldve liked a better camera quality though. After 2 months i broke my screen. But i ordered a screen from ebay and my phone works perfectly again

Reviews.Title: Great phones for the money.
Reviews.Author: Will&Irina
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price. We love it so far. The only thing is I keep getting prompts to download Chinese apps that have erotic photos on them.

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 inch display with super HD (1280*720 pixels) resolution and super slim smartphone/mini pocket tablet pc all in one Upgraded MTK6589 1.2GHz quad core Cortex A7 + GPU Power SGX544 + 1GB RAM + 4GB ROM(system space arround 2.2GB) High sensitive capacitive 5 point multi touch screen
Android 4.2 Jelly Bean, compatible with thousands of apps from google play 3G + WIFI for high speed internet Dual SIM Dual Standby Build in GPS (navigation software is not included) Support external memory card up to 32GB
Bluetooth handsfree calling Dual camera, 5MP front camera, 8MP black camera with flash light, (3264 x 2448 HD photo capturing, 1080P video recording)
ProductInfo.Name: Feiteng H9500 - 5.0 Inch HD (1280*720 pixels) IPS Screen Smart Phone Android 4.2 MTK6589 Quad Core 1.2GHz, 5MP front camera (Grey, White)
